seo.title: FudFate - Web3 Tarot Experience

about.title: What is FudFate?
about.description: FudFate combines the mystical world of tarot with the unpredictable nature of Web3. Our pixel art cards feature crypto memes and Web3 archetypes that will guide you through your blockchain journey.

cards.title: Featured Cards
cards.description: Each card represents an archetype in the Web3 universe

cta.title: Ready to Know Your Crypto Fate?

cookies.title: We Use Cookies
cookies.description: This website uses cookies to enhance user experience and analyze website traffic.

cookiePage.title: Cookie Policy
cookiePage.introduction: This Cookie Policy explains how FudFate uses cookies and similar technologies to recognize you when you visit our website. It explains what these technologies are and why we use them, as well as your rights to control our use of them.
cookiePage.cookiesDefinition: Cookies are small data files that are placed on your computer or mobile device when you visit a website. Cookies are widely used by website owners in order to make their websites work, or to work more efficiently, as well as to provide reporting information.
cookiePage.cookiesUsage: We use first-party and third-party cookies for several reasons. Some cookies are required for technical reasons in order for our Website to operate, and we refer to these as 'essential' or 'strictly necessary' cookies. Other cookies enable us to track and target the interests of our users to enhance the experience on our Website. Third parties serve cookies through our Website for advertising, analytics and other purposes.
cookiePage.essentialCookies: Essential Cookies: These cookies are strictly necessary to provide you with services available through our Website and to use some of its features, such as access to secure areas.
cookiePage.analyticsCookies: Analytics Cookies: These cookies help us understand how visitors interact with our Website, helping us improve our services and providing related statistics.
cookiePage.advertisingCookies: Advertising Cookies: These cookies are used to make advertising messages more relevant to you. They perform functions like preventing the same ad from continuously reappearing, ensuring that ads are properly displayed, and in some cases selecting advertisements that are based on your interests.

whitelist.warningSolflareInPhantomDesc: You are in the Phantom DApp. You should only connect the Phantom wallet to avoid errors.
